ai-tha-ap299:1.4_0: the world’s Elder, and the world does not clever.
ai-tha-ap299:2.1_0: When I had paid homage at her feet,
ai-tha-ap299:2.2_0: they live with the world again.
ai-tha-ap299:2.3_0: Knowing me as a confident heart,
ai-tha-ap299:3.2_0: I recollected the best of Buddha,
ai-tha-ap299:3.3_0: I’ll teach you about my execution,
ai-tha-ap299:3.4_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.
ai-tha-ap299:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap299:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap299:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaccāyana.
ai-tha-ap299:7.1_0: The seventh, the senior, the seventh partridge, and the seventh.
